Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI feedback is more immediate and easily accessible so I personally like it more. That being said, teacher feedback is more industry-specific and tailored.

Question 41.Response: There were no differences in how the feedbacks made me feel.
